paragraph: Michael Cochrane (born September 4, 1948 in Peekskill, New York) is an American jazz pianist who has recorded extensively for SteepleChase Records, as well as Soul Note and Landmark Records. As a sideman, he has recorded with Marvin Peterson, Oliver Lake, Sonny Fortune  and Jack Walrath.
Elements (Soul Note, 1985) with Tom Harrell, Trumpet; Bob Malach, Tenor Saxophone, Flute; Dennis Irwin, Bass; James Madison, Drums
Jack Walrath Quintet at Umbria Jazz Festival, Vol. 1 (Red, 1983 [1985])
Jack Walrath Quintet at Umbria Jazz Festival, Vol. 2 (Red, 1983 [1985])
The Love Within (mja Records, 2001) With David Alan Gross
The Final Answer To Everything (mja records, 1997)
